revision.comment: Created page with "==Metaphor Data Guide== To edit a metaphor or create a new metaphor, type its name in the box below. If the metaphor already exists, you will be taken to its edit page, otherw..."
revision.text:
==Metaphor Data Guide== To edit a metaphor or create a new metaphor, type its name in the box below. If the metaphor already exists, you will be taken to its edit page, otherwise, you can create it from scratch. * Metaphor names should be in all caps
{{#forminput:form=Metaphor|link text= New Metaphor|button text=Create/Edit Metaphor|autocomplete on category=Metaphor}} The list of metaphors is now found here: [[:Category:Metaphor|Metaphors]]. A list of metaphor families can be found here: [[Metaphor Families]] Metaphors listed by type: [[Metaphors by Type]] The list of frames can be found here: [[:Category:Frame|Frames]]. A list of frame families can be found here: [[Frame Families]]. Frames divided into Cogs and Frames can be found here: [[Cogs and Frames]] ==Metaphor Summary Pages== These are pages put together to allow for the browsing of metaphors according to useful descriptive categories. * [[Metaphors that participate in transitive chains]] * [[Metaphors listed by status]] * [[Metaphors with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors indexed by aliases]] * [[Frames listed by status]] * [[Frames with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors that need fixing]] * [[Frames that need fixing]] ==Metaphor Glossary and Property Guide== The glossary, which provides definitions for terms common to conceptual metaphor theory and/or this wiki, is located here: [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Glossary Glossary]. These are the properties that are used to describe a metaphor. You can click on any of the properties to get a better description of its intended filler
[[Property:Related metaphor| Metaphor Relations]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Experiential basis | Experiential Basis of Metaphor]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Level | Metaphor Level]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Type | Metaphor Type]]
[[Property:Inference | Metaphor Inference]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Source frame | Source Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Target frame | Target Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Alias.Provenance | Provenance]]
[[Property:Status | Status]]
[[Property:Entered by | Entered by]]
[[Property:Last reviewed by | Last Reviewed]]
[[Property:Mapping | Mappings]]
==Metaphor Standards== Refer to the [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Standards Standards page] for guides on capitalization, citation, and so on.

revision.comment: moved [[Metaphor Repository (Persian)]] to [[Metaphor Wiki (Persian)]]
revision.text:
==Metaphor Data Guide== To edit a metaphor or create a new metaphor, type its name in the box below. If the metaphor already exists, you will be taken to its edit page, otherwise, you can create it from scratch. * Metaphor names should be in all caps
{{#forminput:form=Metaphor|link text= New Metaphor|button text=Create/Edit Metaphor|autocomplete on category=Metaphor}} The list of metaphors is now found here: [[:Category:Metaphor|Metaphors]]. A list of metaphor families can be found here: [[Metaphor Families]] Metaphors listed by type: [[Metaphors by Type]] The list of frames can be found here: [[:Category:Frame|Frames]]. A list of frame families can be found here: [[Frame Families]]. Frames divided into Cogs and Frames can be found here: [[Cogs and Frames]] ==Metaphor Summary Pages== These are pages put together to allow for the browsing of metaphors according to useful descriptive categories. * [[Metaphors that participate in transitive chains]] * [[Metaphors listed by status]] * [[Metaphors with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors indexed by aliases]] * [[Frames listed by status]] * [[Frames with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors that need fixing]] * [[Frames that need fixing]] ==Metaphor Glossary and Property Guide== The glossary, which provides definitions for terms common to conceptual metaphor theory and/or this wiki, is located here: [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Glossary Glossary]. These are the properties that are used to describe a metaphor. You can click on any of the properties to get a better description of its intended filler
[[Property:Related metaphor| Metaphor Relations]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Experiential basis | Experiential Basis of Metaphor]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Level | Metaphor Level]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Type | Metaphor Type]]
[[Property:Inference | Metaphor Inference]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Source frame | Source Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Target frame | Target Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Alias.Provenance | Provenance]]
[[Property:Status | Status]]
[[Property:Entered by | Entered by]]
[[Property:Last reviewed by | Last Reviewed]]
[[Property:Mapping | Mappings]]
==Metaphor Standards== Refer to the [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Standards Standards page] for guides on capitalization, citation, and so on.

revision.comment: /* Metaphor Data Guide */
revision.text:
==Metaphor Data Guide== To edit a metaphor or create a new metaphor, type its name in the box below. If the metaphor already exists, you will be taken to its edit page, otherwise, you can create it from scratch. * Metaphor names should be in all caps
{{#forminput:form=Metaphor|link text= New Metaphor|button text=Create/Edit Metaphor|autocomplete on category=Metaphor}} The list of metaphors is now found here: [[:Category:Metaphor|Metaphors]]. A list of metaphor families can be found here: [[Metaphor Families]] Metaphors listed by type: [[Metaphors by Type]] The list of frames can be found here: [[:Category:Frame|Frames]]. A list of frame families can be found here: [[Frame Families]]. Frames divided into Cogs and Frames can be found here: [[Cogs and Frames]] A graph of relations between all the metaphors in the repository is here: [[Map of all metaphors]] ==Metaphor Summary Pages== These are pages put together to allow for the browsing of metaphors according to useful descriptive categories. * [[Metaphors that participate in transitive chains]] * [[Metaphors listed by status]] * [[Metaphors with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors indexed by aliases]] * [[Frames listed by status]] * [[Frames with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors that need fixing]] * [[Frames that need fixing]] ==Metaphor Glossary and Property Guide== The glossary, which provides definitions for terms common to conceptual metaphor theory and/or this wiki, is located here: [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Glossary Glossary]. These are the properties that are used to describe a metaphor. You can click on any of the properties to get a better description of its intended filler
[[Property:Related metaphor| Metaphor Relations]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Experiential basis | Experiential Basis of Metaphor]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Level | Metaphor Level]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Type | Metaphor Type]]
[[Property:Inference | Metaphor Inference]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Source frame | Source Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Target frame | Target Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Alias.Provenance | Provenance]]
[[Property:Status | Status]]
[[Property:Entered by | Entered by]]
[[Property:Last reviewed by | Last Reviewed]]
[[Property:Mapping | Mappings]]
==Metaphor Standards== Refer to the [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Standards Standards page] for guides on capitalization, citation, and so on.

revision.comment: /* Metaphor Data Guide */
revision.text:
==Metaphor Data Guide== To edit a metaphor or create a new metaphor, type its name in the box below. If the metaphor already exists, you will be taken to its edit page, otherwise, you can create it from scratch. برای ویرایش یک استعاره، عنوان آن را در فضای زیرین وارد نمایید.
{{#forminput:form=Metaphor|link text= New Metaphor|button text=Create/Edit Metaphor|autocomplete on category=Metaphor}} فهرست استعاره ها در اینجا یافت میشود؛ [[:Category:Metaphor|Metaphors]]. فهرست خانواده استعاره ها در اینجا یافت میشود: [[Metaphor Families]] Metaphors listed by type: [[Metaphors by Type]] The list of frames can be found here: [[:Category:Frame|Frames]]. A list of frame families can be found here: [[Frame Families]]. Frames divided into Cogs and Frames can be found here: [[Cogs and Frames]] A graph of relations between all the metaphors in the repository is here: [[Map of all metaphors]] ==Metaphor Summary Pages== These are pages put together to allow for the browsing of metaphors according to useful descriptive categories. * [[Metaphors that participate in transitive chains]] * [[Metaphors listed by status]] * [[Metaphors with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors indexed by aliases]] * [[Frames listed by status]] * [[Frames with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors that need fixing]] * [[Frames that need fixing]] ==Metaphor Glossary and Property Guide== The glossary, which provides definitions for terms common to conceptual metaphor theory and/or this wiki, is located here: [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Glossary Glossary]. These are the properties that are used to describe a metaphor. You can click on any of the properties to get a better description of its intended filler
[[Property:Related metaphor| Metaphor Relations]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Experiential basis | Experiential Basis of Metaphor]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Level | Metaphor Level]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Type | Metaphor Type]]
[[Property:Inference | Metaphor Inference]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Source frame | Source Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Target frame | Target Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Alias.Provenance | Provenance]]
[[Property:Status | Status]]
[[Property:Entered by | Entered by]]
[[Property:Last reviewed by | Last Reviewed]]
[[Property:Mapping | Mappings]]
==Metaphor Standards== Refer to the [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Standards Standards page] for guides on capitalization, citation, and so on.

revision.comment: /* Metaphor Data Guide */
revision.text:
==Metaphor Data Guide== To edit a metaphor or create a new metaphor, type its name in the box below. If the metaphor already exists, you will be taken to its edit page, otherwise, you can create it from scratch. برای ویرایش یک استعاره، عنوان آن را در فضای زیرین وارد نمایید.
{{#forminput:form=Metaphor|link text= New Metaphor|button text=Create/Edit Metaphor|autocomplete on category=Metaphor}} فهرست استعاره ها در اینجا یافت میشود: [[:Category:Metaphor|استعاره ها]]. فهرست خانواده استعاره ها در اینجا یافت میشود: [[خانواده استعاره ها]] --> Metaphors listed by type: [[Metaphors by Type]] The list of frames can be found here: [[:Category:Frame|Frames]]. A list of frame families can be found here: [[Frame Families]]. Frames divided into Cogs and Frames can be found here: [[Cogs and Frames]] A graph of relations between all the metaphors in the repository is here: [[Map of all metaphors]]

{{#forminput:form=Metaphor|link text= New Metaphor|button text=Create/Edit Metaphor|autocomplete on category=Metaphor}} فهرست استعاره ها در اینجا یافت میشود: [[:Category:Metaphor|استعاره ها]]. فهرست خانواده استعاره ها در اینجا یافت میشود: [[خانواده استعاره ها]] --!> Metaphors listed by type: [[Metaphors by Type]] The list of frames can be found here: [[:Category:Frame|Frames]]. A list of frame families can be found here: [[Frame Families]]. Frames divided into Cogs and Frames can be found here: [[Cogs and Frames]] A graph of relations between all the metaphors in the repository is here: [[Map of all metaphors]] ==Metaphor Summary Pages== These are pages put together to allow for the browsing of metaphors according to useful descriptive categories. * [[Metaphors that participate in transitive chains]] * [[Metaphors listed by status]] * [[Metaphors with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors indexed by aliases]] * [[Frames listed by status]] * [[Frames with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors that need fixing]] * [[Frames that need fixing]] ==Metaphor Glossary and Property Guide== The glossary, which provides definitions for terms common to conceptual metaphor theory and/or this wiki, is located here: [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Glossary Glossary]. ==Metaphor Data Guide== To edit a metaphor or create a new metaphor, type its name in the box below. If the metaphor already exists, you will be taken to its edit page, otherwise, you can create it from scratch. برای ویرایش یک استعاره، عنوان آن را در فضای زیرین وارد نمایید.
{{#forminput:form=Metaphor|link text= New Metaphor|button text=Create/Edit Metaphor|autocomplete on namespace=Metaphor|namespace=Metaphor}} فهرست استعاره ها در اینجا یافت میشود: [[List of all Metaphors|استعاره ها]]. فهرست خانواده استعاره ها در اینجا یافت میشود: [[خانواده استعاره ها]] Metaphors listed by type: [[Metaphors by Type]] The list of frames can be found here: [[:Category:Frame|Frames]]. A list of frame families can be found here: [[Frame Families]]. Frames divided into Cogs and Frames can be found here: [[Cogs and Frames]] A graph of relations between all the metaphors in the repository is here: [[Map of all metaphors]] ==Metaphor Summary Pages== These are pages put together to allow for the browsing of metaphors according to useful descriptive categories. * [[Metaphors that participate in transitive chains]] * [[Metaphors listed by status]] * [[Metaphors with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors indexed by aliases]] * [[Frames listed by status]] * [[Frames with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors that need fixing]] * [[Frames that need fixing]] ==Metaphor Glossary and Property Guide== The glossary, which provides definitions for terms common to conceptual metaphor theory and/or this wiki, is located here: [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Glossary Glossary]. These are the properties that are used to describe a metaphor. You can click on any of the properties to get a better description of its intended filler
[[Property:Related metaphor| Metaphor Relations]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Experiential basis | Experiential Basis of Metaphor]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Level | Metaphor Level]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Type | Metaphor Type]]
[[Property:Inference | Metaphor Inference]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Source frame | Source Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Target frame | Target Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Alias.Provenance | Provenance]]
[[Property:Status | Status]]
[[Property:Entered by | Entered by]]
[[Property:Last reviewed by | Last Reviewed]]
[[Property:Mapping | Mappings]]
==Metaphor Standards== Refer to the [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Standards Standards page] for guides on capitalization, citation, and so on.
